data.eml:eml: New data on brachypterous Paederus (Coleoptera, Staphylinidae) of mainland China

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Li, Qi-Li, Li, Li-Zhen, Gu, Fuang-Kang, Peng, Zhong (2016): New data on brachypterous Paederus (Coleoptera, Staphylinidae) of mainland China. Zootaxa 4184 (3): 576-588, DOI: http://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4184.3.11
